      • buildFromFiles

        public static TransplantGraph buildFromFiles(java.lang.String donorFile,
                                             java.lang.String recipientFile)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        A method that adds donors/recipients from file to TransplantGraph.
        Parameters:
        donorFile - The donor File to get donors from to be added.
        recipientFile - The recipient File to get recipient from to be added.
        Returns:
        TransplantGraph Transplant Graph generated from the files.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Exception thrown if IO Error
